header.title: Lead Re-engagement
header.subtitle: Revitalize dormant leads and boost conversions.

classification.title: Lead Classification
classification.description: Define and manage criteria for classifying leads (hot, warm, cold) to target re-engagement efforts effectively.

tasks.title: Re-engagement Tasks
tasks.description: View, assign, and track manual or automated tasks related to your re-engagement campaigns and lead follow-ups.

automation.title: Automation Rules
automation.description: Configure automated workflows and triggers for re-engaging leads based on their classification and behavior.
